Head Trainer Kilremange:

Using Automatic Hunting you can choose close or far targets, automatically pick up drooping loot and use the Manner mode.

You can put Attack in the Shortcuts together with the Skills and configure it to be used automatically. If you put your Skills in the Shortcuts and click them with the right mouse button, you can activate them for Automatic Hunting using option Automatic Hunting: on/off.
I suggest you use Automatic Hunting to defeat the Skeleton Archers and Skeleton Warriors that inhabit the first training grounds.
It's not far from here but I can teleport you there if you don't want to waste time.
